events.message: I received my order last week but the product isn’t what I expected and I’d like to request a refund.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request based on customer message content.
Support agent Lisa has been assigned to handle the refund request for this case.
Hello, I’m Lisa from customer support. I’m sorry to hear the product wasn’t as expected. I’m here to help with your refund.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason you would like a refund to proceed?
Sure, my order number is 458976. The item was different from the description and I don’t want to keep it.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a refund once the product is returned. I will send you the return label shortly.
That sounds good. Please send the return shipping label at your earliest convenience.
Return label has been sent to your email. Once we receive the product back, the refund will be processed promptly.
Just checking in to confirm you received the return label and if you need any further assistance with the refund process.
Yes, I received the label and already shipped the package back. Thank you for your help.
We have received your returned product and your refund has been processed successfully to your original payment method.
We have sent you a short survey to gather your feedback about your refund experience with us.
Customer completed the satisfaction survey indicating a positive experience and gratefulness for the smooth refund process.
The case has been formally closed following successful refund and positive customer feedback.
